title: Mobile Me Style Handwriting Font
content:
Hey Everyone,

I’m looking for a font similar to the type Apple used for “me” in the [Mobile Me](http://web.archive.org/web/20091004032035/http:/www.apple.com/mobileme/) logo. Something scripty that looks handwritten, but still very clean and readable. Also, it’s essential that the letters connect, because the text itself will be the word “Connect.” Thanks in advance!

Matt

Edit: Nevermind... since I know exactly what I’m going for I think I’m going to roll my own. Let me know if you want to see the end result.
author: Maverick18x

comments.content:
This may not get you very far, but if you are on, or can access a PC running Vista, one of the new fonts included there is called Segoe Script. It is in a very similar style and is built to connect, as well as use stylistic alternates by default, so your 2 n’s would be different.

Might save you some trouble; have you made a connecting handwriting typeface before? ;)

\>access a PC running Vista, one of the new fonts included there is called Segoe Script. It is in a very similar style and is built to connect,

Yet another clear example of Microsoft copying Apple!

First Lucida Unicode and now this.
